医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
COVID-19 疫苗接种是否与牛皮癣的出现或发作有关？研究人员探讨了 COVID-19 疫苗接种与牛皮癣发作或恶化之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Is-COVID-19-vaccination-linked-to-psoriasis-emergence-or-flare-ups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Is-COVID-19-vaccination-linked-to-psoriasis-emergence-or-flare-ups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9de99bd-00f1-4c47-9739-1d74684a3f8d Mon, 07 Aug 2023 08:22:00 -0400 Is COVID-19 vaccination linked to psoriasis emergence or flare-ups?
COVID-19 诊断后，遗传学、生活方式以及心血管和血栓栓塞事件有何关联？最近的一项研究评估了 COVID-19 后宿主遗传学、生活方式因素以及心血管和血栓栓塞事件之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/How-are-genics-lifestyles-and-cardioangio-and-thrombembbolic-events-linked-following-COVID-19-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/How-are-genics-lifestyles-and-cardioangio-and-throrboembbolic-events-linked-following-COVID-19-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7f2b24b-a8d3-4d61-ae26-79630b29b3fe Mon, 07 Aug 2023 08:12:00 -0400 How are genetics, lifestyles, and cardiovascular and thromboembolic events associated following COVID-19 diagnosis?
静息心率的遗传学及其与心血管疾病的关系研究人员调查了静息心率背后的遗传学及其对心血管疾病的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/The- Genetics-of-resting-heart-rate-and-its-connection-to-cardioangio-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/The- Genetics-of-resting-heart-rate-and-its-connection-to-cardioangio-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a193530-452f-4cd9-acf4-7c6aa1d01d9f Mon, 07 Aug 2023 07:57:00 -0400 The genetics of resting heart rate and its connection to cardiovascular disorders
饮食模式如何影响炎症性肠病？研究人员使用文献计量学来分析描述饮食模式对炎症性肠病（IBD）影响的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/How-do-dietary-patterns-influence-itis-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/How-do-dietary-patterns-influence-itis-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08eb92e7-b105-483f-9ab9-251589a46398 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 07:42:00 -0400 How do dietary patterns influence inflammatory bowel disease?
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 冻结了一项研究项目。这是自我审查吗？许多美国人不太了解自己的健康。无论是由于人们相信阴谋论，还是只是在不了解医生所说内容的情况下走出医生的办公室，传达科学家所知道的信息一直是一个长期存在的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/The-NIH-ices-a-research-project-Is-it-self-censorship.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/The-NIH-ices-a-research-project-Is-it-self-censorship.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b362212e-62e5-47e4-82de-dbba23c9272d Mon, 07 Aug 2023 06:53:43 -0400 The NIH ices a research project. Is it self-censorship?
随着许多美国城市变得越来越热，卫生系统面临着中暑的挑战下午三点过去，新奥尔良的法国区已经没有游客和当地人了。炎热指数超过105度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/As-many-American-cities-get-hotter-health-systems-face-off-against-heatrinkle.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/As-many-American-cities-get-hotter-health-systems-face-off-against-heatrinkle.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e585142-5373-4aa5-a147-6c2d8dad9846 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 06:52:00 -0400 As many American cities get hotter, health systems face off against heatstroke
营养丰富的食物可以改善人类健康吗？研究人员整理了有关营养丰富食品研究进展的科学证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Do- Nutrition-enriched-foods-improve- human-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Do- Nutrition-enriched-foods-improve- human-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebc78dc8-9aa4-41b6-af28-badf5399ca3e Mon, 07 Aug 2023 06:49:00 -0400 Do nutrient-enriched foods improve human health?
研究开发革命性的工具包来对抗数字排斥研究人员创建了数字排除的综合指标和相关工具箱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Research-develop-a-revolutionary-toolkit-to-combat-digital-exclusion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Research-develop-a-revolutionary-toolkit-to-combat-digital-exclusion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5a425b1-b7ec-48e2-ab1d-b2043e7a4752 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 05:09:00 -0400 Research develop a revolutionary toolkit to combat digital exclusion
了解免疫缺陷状态下 SARS-CoV-2 进化和清除的变化研究人员描述了免疫抑制个体中持续感染 SARS-CoV-2 的病毒学范围。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Understanding-variations-in-SARS-CoV-2-evolution-and-clearance-by-immunodefiency-status.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Understanding-variations-in-SARS-CoV-2-evolution-and-clearance-by-immunodeficiency-status.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f9f176b-4de8-41cd-b3f0-0c2f96fcc7b0 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 05:02:00 -0400 Understanding variations in SARS-CoV-2 evolution and clearance by immunodeficiency status
M2巨噬细胞衍生的外泌体在控制脓毒症中性粒细胞介导的组织损伤中的作用研究人员调查 M2 巨噬细胞衍生的外泌体是否可以预防脓毒症期间炎症相关的损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Role-of-M2-macrophage-衍生-exosomes-in-controlling-neutropil-media-tissue-injury-in-sepsis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Role-of-M2-巨噬细胞-衍生-外泌体-in-controlling-中性粒细胞-介导-组织-injury-in-sepsis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7190df63-8efe-45cf-a079-88084ceedb4a Mon, 07 Aug 2023 04:53:00 -0400 Role of M2 macrophage-derived exosomes in controlling neutrophil-mediated tissue injury in sepsis
